comments.content: It looks like a modified **[Lucida Sans (Demibold Italic)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174756/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=MS-Windows-Fonts&ffam=Lucida%20Sans%20-%20Demibold%20Italic&fid=cce0fc15ab2724f42e5da2272ff386c0&fsize=48&text=Classic%20Noodles%20Beef%20Flavour&wrap=2)**
